text: Does anyone know why the "Last modified" date on the bottom of this page is "0001-01-01"? <https://sethaxen.com/blog/>

elements.text: Does anyone know why the "Last modified" date on the bottom of this page is "0001-01-01"?

text:
the first idea could of course be, that you did that a long time ago :wink:

Does your blogposts function (or maybe fd2html?) Mess around with the variables for `fd_time`?
